original_text: He took 600 of his best chariots with him., as well as all the other chariots of Egypt. All the chariots had officers to drive them.
korean_text: 선발된 병거 육백 대와 애굽의 모든 병거를 동원하니 지휘관들이 다 거느렸더라

sentences.original_text: He took 600 of his best chariots with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 최고의 전차 600대를 데리고 갔다

sentences.original_text: as well as all the other chariots of Egypt
All the chariots had officers to drive them
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 전차에는 그들을 운전할 장교들이 있었다
